post.text: You don't want to miss this one: Join Hillary, President Obama, First Lady Michelle Obama, President Bill Clinton, and Chelsea Clinton live in Philly on the eve of Election Day.

comment.author: Brittany
comment.text: So many racists say Obama was a bad president but in reality he will go down as one of our best!! He will sure be missed. And he might be one of the best if not the best speaking president ever.

replies.author: Colin
replies.text: And Hillary will do as much for women as Obama did for people of color.

replies.author: Michael
replies.text: Um... people just don't like socialism. Not about skin color.

replies.author: Kaitlyn
replies.text: Being black doesn't make you a bad president - being a bad president makes you a bad president. I would expect nothing less, however, from a democratic culture that uses any minority attribute to claim discrimination or prejudice. #Predictable

replies.author: Katie
replies.text: He was a BAD president ....white, pink, yellow or green. Stop bringing race into it. When you do, YOU are the racist.
